subject: Physical Fitness
title: Deep Sleep: The Repair Phase
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on Deep Sleep: The Repair Phase.

hook.text: During deep sleep, your brain waves slow to a crawl. This is when the heaviest physical repair happens.

buildup.text: Delta waves dominate. Heart rate drops. Blood pressure falls. Blood flow redirects to muscles and tissues.

discovery.text: Growth hormone floods the bloodstream. Damaged muscle fibers are repaired and reinforced with new protein.

twist.text: Alcohol suppresses deep sleep even in small amounts. A nightcap sabotages the most restorative phase.

climax.text: Deep sleep declines naturally with age, but exercise and consistent bedtimes help preserve it.

punchline.text: Deep sleep is your nightly repair shop. Protect it fiercely.

quiz.question: What is a major factor that suppresses deep sleep?
options: Alcohol consumption, even in small amounts
